text: Winnie-the-Pooh () is a 1969 Soviet animated movie directed by Fyodor Khitruk.Умерла создательница «Винни-Пуха» Виолетта КолесниковаВинни-Пух ==Actors== * Vladimir Osenev as the narrator * Yevgeny Leonov as Winnie-the- Pooh * Iya Savvina as Piglet == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1969 movies Category:1960s animated movies Category:Soviet animated movies
title: Winnie-the-Pooh (1969 movie)
